parameters: ……そういう模様の壁だと間違えそうになるほどに
開く気配がまるでない。
……全ての間の鏡を割った今なら、
望むならこの大扉を開けることができるかもしれない。
「これで、お前が次に進むべき道は示されたな」
「結局私もリョウタロウさんも、
ミシロちゃんに助けられっぱなしだったね」
とても鏡なんて探し出せなかっただろうよ」
「お前には俺の記憶を知る権利がある。
「俺はお前に話すべきことが……、
そしてお前の両親についての情報がある」
「私もミシロちゃんに話すべきことがあるよ」
「私という人間、そして私が今ここにいる理由と、
珠姫さんの娘について……」
「……二人とも、走って！　大扉の向こうへ！」
「おいおい、追ってきてるみたいだぞ！？」
「話は後、どこか隠れられそうな場所まで
……まだやることがあるはずだ。
Whoaaa, I picked one heck of a moment to be here!"
"Oh, sorry! Sorry! Here I am getting all excited!"
"You just came to this world, right?
"I'm Yuzu. I'm sure you can't remember your name,
but don't fret. Everybody's like that at first."
Wait, you do know your name?!"
"That's weird... It took me so long
for me to remember my name..."
"This is known as the \c[2]Mirror World\c[0]. It seems to be
a world for souls with strong wishes or attachments."
"I think it's one of those places
between life and the afterlife, maybe..."
"I just found myself here one day,
so I can't tell you anything concrete."
"But the weird thing is, while I remember
having died with some strong wish...."
AND you know how to grant it?!"
"Hold up, Mishiro, how blessed ARE you?!
Gosh, the world's not fair even in death!"
"...Well, anyway. If you're going to walk around,
be careful of the evil spirits wandering here."
"Because they'll be jealous of a soul
who can grant their wish, no doubt..."
"It's seriously rare for two souls to wander in
in such a short span of time!"
"But looking at you makes something nag at me...
That's the name in this suit, so."
"I was wandering this strange world for a bit
before finding Yuzu there... What's with it, really?"
"This is a world where souls with a wish end up!
Can you remember your wish, Ryotaro?"
Like a fog over all my memories..."
"Well, yeah. I was like that at first.
So all I can say is, really, a while ago."
"I think it's been several years, maybe."
"Probably. Long enough ago that I've gotten
used to this place, and having no memory."
"I've seen other mirrors around this world,
but they showed other people, or nothing at all..."
I found a mirror of mine earlier
The mirrors are deep in the realms
I found a mirror of mine earlier
The mirrors are deep in the realms
really proactive while I'm not looking!"
"...If you keep it up and find more mirrors,
could you try to look for our mirrors too?"
"I don't think it's a coincidence that
you seem different from other souls, Mishiro."
"Just, while you're at it! If you have time!"
"When I remembered my name, I saw a mirror.
It was so long ago, I don't remember too well..."
"But I'm sure those mirrors are important to this world.
That's why it's called the Mirror World!"
その出逢いは一筋の光明なりや
For whom does the brush dance?
On the wind sounds tragedy's end and beginning.
Bathe in it if you wish, and go mad.
No life can live before a distorted wheel.
Unlocked the door with the \i[240]\c[2]Bronze Key\c[0].
Unlocked the door with the \i[242]\c[2]Silver Key\c[0].
Unlocked the door with the \i[243]\c[2]Gold Key\c[0].
Unlocked the door with the \i[243]\c[2]Gold Key\c[0].
Unlocked the door with the \i[240]\c[2]Bronze Key\c[0].
you're remembering who you are bit by bit?"
"Get back our memories, grant our wish...
What'll happen to us deceased after that?"
"Surely we'll be at peace and go to heaven, eh?"
So, I'll get my memories back if I go there?!"
Sorry to trouble you, but lead me there!"
\c[6]※When you enter the realm with the mirror,
"To see someone other than yourself in a mirror...
If it were me, my legs'd surely give out."
"...Don't look at me like that, please.
I never wanted it shown in broad daylight either..."
Can they truly be found so quickly?"
Sorry to trouble you, but lead me there!"
\c[6]※When you enter the realm with the mirror,
"Really walking around a lot, aren't you?
You're far braver than I am, it would seem."
"My boss was Shinji Usui. And sis was...
And the child of my boss and sis..."
"...What's left is the why of me being here.
Of course, the same goes for you."
The third one... I sense big things coming."
Sorry to trouble you, but lead me there!"
\c[6]※When you enter the realm with the mirror,
An ending is approaching, I feel..."
"Let me get my memories sorted out.
I haven't quite digested them myself."
"Oh, but if you're going to that room, just tell me.
You're free to get my help whenever."
We can talk later. Handle that first."
She's finally free from this world. Let's be happy."
If you can open it, your ending must be near too."
I always stayed away because of all the evil spirits..."
"Does that stuff not bother you, Mishiro?"
"...Huh? You saw one of my mirrors?!
If we're together, even those realms won't scare me!"
\c[6]※When you enter the realm with the mirror,
"Now that we've finally found a mirror of mine,
"...It's not like I only like girls, yeah?
"I just happened to fall for a girl first!
...I mean, I do think you're kind of cute too."
Wow, two in such a short time!"
If we're together, even those realms won't scare me!"
\c[6]※When you enter the realm with the mirror,
"I can't wait to get my memories, and I know it's important,
but I'm also worried about my past being too intense..."
"...I wonder if I managed to confess to Utsuro in the end?"
it seems like I died in middle school..."
"If my wish is something like that,
then haunting the living probably won't work..."
This makes three... Feels like the finale!"
If we're together, even those realms won't scare me!"
\c[6]※When you enter the realm with the mirror,
"I'm sure this next one is super important...
Maybe I'll even remember my wish..."
"...It was tiring getting it all back at once."
"Oh, if you're going in that room, I'm coming too.
I'm curious about it, and it's surely safer!"
He's free from this world... It's surely a good thing."
Let's go through the door. The end must be near."
"You're going to explore with Ryotaro too, right?
We can talk anytime, so finish that first."
"You think you can open this big door?"
"Had no trouble with the one in the back of that realm.
Surely you can open it if you put your mind to it."
"Say, Mishiro, do you think you can open this door?"
I'm sure this'll open for you too."
